code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec min_operations(nums :: [integer], k :: integer) :: integer
  def min_operations(nums, k) do
    nums
    |> Enum.reverse() # Reverse the list to start removing elements from the end
    |> Enum.reduce({%{}, 0}, fn num, {collected, ops} -> 
      if Map.has_key?(collected, num) or num > k do
        {collected, ops + 1} # If the number is already collected or greater than k, just increase the operation count
      else
        {Map.put(collected, num, true), ops + 1} # Add the number to the collection and increase the operation count
      end
    end)
    |> then(fn {_collected, ops} -> ops end) # Return only the operation count
  end
end
